name: Rail Tycoon (itch)
description:
Submission for the Weekly Game Jam Week 163: Tycoon

Instructions:

  • press esc to close the game from anywhere in the project
  • click cities to view their economy
  • right click a city, then click another city to build a railroad
  • when in the process of building a railroad, left click to rotate through the type of railroad
  • when in the process of building a railroad, right click to cancel

Music: https://www.bensound.com

Fonts: https://mattwalkden.itch.io/pixel-font-pack
